scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Family on their journey, likely the Flight into Egypt. The Virgin Mary, with a halo, is seated on a donkey, cradling the Christ Child, who also has a halo. Saint Joseph, with a halo and carrying a staff and a red bundle, walks beside the donkey. An ox stands to the left of the donkey. The background features a lush, green forest on the left and a mountainous, snowy landscape on the right. The scene is framed by decorative borders, including cherubic heads and scrolling foliage at the top, and a blue and gold ornamental motif on the right.
